verses.verse: Hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> you children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> for Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has a charge <S%H7379><s%> against the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land: <S%H776><s%> "Indeed there is no truth, <S%H571><s%> nor goodness, <S%H2617><s%> nor knowledge <S%H1847><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%>

There is cursing, <S%H422><s%> lying, <S%H3584><s%> murder, <S%H7523><s%> stealing, <S%H1589><s%> and committing adultery; <S%H5003><s%> they break boundaries, <S%H6555><s%> and bloodshed <S%H1818><s%> causes <S%H5060><s%> bloodshed. <S%H1818><s%>

Therefore the land <S%H776><s%> will mourn, <S%H56><s%> and everyone who dwells <S%H3427><s%> therein will waste <S%H535><s%> away. <S%H2416><s%> all living things in her, even the animals of the field <S%H7704><s%> and the birds <S%H5775><s%> of the sky; <S%H8064><s%> yes, <S%H1709><s%> the fish of the sea <S%H3220><s%> also die. <S%H622><s%>

"Yet let no man <S%H376><s%> bring a charge, <S%H7378><s%> neither let any man accuse; <S%H3198><s%> <S%H376><s%> For your people <S%H5971><s%> are like those who bring charges <S%H7378><s%> against a priest. <S%H3548><s%>

You will stumble <S%H3782><s%> in the day, <S%H3117><s%> and the prophet <S%H5030><s%> will also stumble <S%H3782><s%> with you in the night; <S%H3915><s%> and I will destroy <S%H1820><s%> your mother. <S%H517><s%>

My people <S%H5971><s%> are destroyed <S%H1820><s%> for lack of knowledge. <S%H1847><s%> Because you have rejected <S%H3988><s%> knowledge, <S%H1847><s%> I will also reject <S%H3988><s%> you, <S%H3547><s%> that you may be no priest to me. <S%H7911><s%> Because you have forgotten your God <S%H430><s%>'s law, <S%H8451><s%> I will also forget <S%H7911><s%> your children. <S%H1121><s%>
As they were multiplied, <S%H7230><s%> so they sinned <S%H2398><s%> against me. <S%H4171><s%> I will change their glory <S%H3519><s%> into shame. <S%H7036><s%>
They feed <S%H398><s%> on the sin <S%H2403><s%> of my people, <S%H5971><s%> and set <S%H5375><s%> their heart <S%H5315><s%> on their iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>
It will be, <S%H5971><s%> like people, like priest; <S%H3548><s%> and I will punish <S%H6485><s%> them for their ways, <S%H1870><s%> and will repay <S%H7725><s%> them for their deeds. <S%H4611><s%>

They will eat, <S%H398><s%> and not have enough. <S%H7646><s%> They will play the prostitute, <S%H2181><s%> and will not increase; <S%H6555><s%> because they have abandoned <S%H5800><s%> giving <S%H8104><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
Prostitution, <S%H2184><s%> wine, <S%H3196><s%> and new wine <S%H8492><s%> take away <S%H3947><s%> understanding. <S%H3820><s%>

My people <S%H5971><s%> consult <S%H7592><s%> with their wooden idol, <S%H6086><s%> and answer <S%H5046><s%> to a stick <S%H4731><s%> of wood. <S%H7307><s%> Indeed the spirit of prostitution <S%H2183><s%> has led them astray, <S%H8582><s%> and they have been unfaithful <S%H2181><s%> to their God. <S%H430><s%>

They sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> on the tops <S%H7218><s%> of the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and burn incense <S%H6999><s%> on the hills, <S%H1389><s%> under oaks <S%H437><s%> and poplars <S%H3839><s%> and terebinths, <S%H424><s%> because its shade <S%H6738><s%> is good. <S%H2896><s%> Therefore your daughters <S%H1323><s%> play the prostitute, <S%H2181><s%> and your brides <S%H3618><s%> commit adultery. <S%H5003><s%>

I will not punish <S%H6485><s%> your daughters <S%H1323><s%> when they play the prostitute, <S%H2181><s%> nor your brides <S%H3618><s%> when they commit adultery; <S%H5003><s%> because the men consort <S%H6504><s%> with prostitutes, <S%H2181><s%> and they sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> with the shrine prostitutes; <S%H6948><s%> so the people <S%H5971><s%> without understanding <S%H995><s%> will come to ruin. <S%H3832><s%>

"Though you, <S%H3478><s%> Israel, play the prostitute, <S%H2181><s%> yet don't <S%H3063><s%> let Judah offend; <S%H816><s%> and don't <S%H935><s%> come to Gilgal, <S%H1537><s%> neither go up <S%H5927><s%> to Beth Aven, <S%H1007><s%> nor swear, <S%H7650><s%> <S%H3068><s%> 'As Yahweh lives. <S%H2416><s%>'

For Israel <S%H3478><s%> has behaved extremely stubbornly, <S%H5637><s%> like a stubborn <S%H5637><s%> heifer. <S%H6510><s%> Then how will Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> feed <S%H7462><s%> them like a lamb <S%H3532><s%> in a meadow. <S%H4800><s%>
Ephraim <S%H669><s%> is joined <S%H2266><s%> to idols. <S%H6091><s%> Leave him alone! <S%H3240><s%>

Their drink <S%H5435><s%> has become sour. <S%H5493><s%> They play the prostitute <S%H2181><s%> continually. <S%H2181><s%> Her rulers <S%H4043><s%> dearly <S%H3051><s%> love <S%H157><s%> their shameful way. <S%H7036><s%>
The wind <S%H7307><s%> has wrapped her up <S%H6887><s%> in its wings; <S%H3671><s%> and they shall be disappointed <S%H954><s%> because of their sacrifices. <S%H2077><s%>
